Description:
Summary:We are seeking an enthusiastic and creative Marketing Specialist to join our team at our fast-food restaurant, which has five branches. You should have a strategic vision and the ability to develop and execute successful marketing campaigns to increase restaurant awareness and attract more customers.Responsibilities:Develop and implement marketing strategies to increase restaurant awareness and attract more customers.
Manage advertising campaigns on social media platforms and online advertisements.
Create and enhance marketing content such as posts, images, and videos.
Design advertisements and posts, either independently or in collaboration with online designers.
Monitor and manage interactions with delivery apps to ensure a smooth ordering and delivery experience for customers.
Analyze data and utilize it to measure the effectiveness of marketing campaigns and make strategic decisions.
Develop partnerships with media outlets or other entities to increase restaurant visibility.
Coordinate and organize promotional events and offers across branches.
Stay updated on fast-food market trends and competition, providing suggestions to improve marketing strategies.Skills
Skills:
Previous experience in marketing, preferably in the restaurant or food service sector.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to build good relationships with the audience and media.
Familiarity with the latest digital marketing trends and effective use of social media.
Ability to work independently and within a team.
Analytical skills to measure campaign success and identify areas for improvement.
